entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FAR doesn't list all references from file linked into multiple project #66558
  • Variables captured in a lambda and in a local function are getting different treatment in DefiniteAssignmentPass #66557
  • An exception is thrown when getting the compilation. #66556

Closed

  • Roslyn fails to correctly infer nullable annotations in list patterns' variables #65976
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` omits accessibility level for accessors #66379
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Inline diagnostics - integration tests #66563
    Area-IDE
  • Update capabilities for streaming references #66562
    Area-IDE
  • Update BCL versions to .NET 7 #66561
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not restrict field locations to the same document for "Replace with autoproperty" refactoring #66555
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Complete interpolated raw string when more than one dollar sign #66554
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Introduce parser helper for parsing separated syntax lists. #66552
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce delegate allocations in LanguageParser #66551
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66549
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Don't overwrite binary logs #66559
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Correctly emit accessibility when generating properties via `SyntaxGenerator` #66543
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Disregard static abstract methods as entrypoint candidates #66525
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support emitting type-parameter variance in syntax generator #66446
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for generating ref-members in SyntaxGenerator #66445
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for brace pair highlighting for C# and VB (F#/TS can add support as well if desired). #66348
    Area-IDE
  • Add VerifyMethodBody helper as a replacement of VerifyIL #66536
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Add serializer for bool?, enum, and enum? options #66526
    Area-IDE
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.6
  • Simplify GlobalKeywordRecommender #65814
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Report example of unanalyzed node in `NullableWalker` #66385
    Area-Compilers
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
  • Obsolete `ISourceGenerator` APIs #66462
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Test/implement some aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66499
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Add F1 test for scoped #64094
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • ignore top level statements from move static member refactoring #61227
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement LSP codelens for reference counts #66537
    Area-IDE
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE
